Dayum.

Plot:
No plot cause it's multiplayer only.

Gameplay:
It's a multiplayer FPS game that actually requires skill. Literally, you will have to have no life in order to master this game. You may or may not get super pissed at this game.

Graphics:
Eh.

Verdict:
No matter how pissed I may be at this game, I still respect it for being the few FPS games that require REAL skill.

9/10. Get this bundled with Gmod. It will be worth it.

CS起源也让我认识了很多游戏之外的朋友，有的也对我的行为和思想产生了很大的影响[spoiler] 感谢男神钮钮[/spoiler]

Being the ancestor of the well-known Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, this game is the base of a good First Person Shooter.

The ultimate challenging and mastering Counter-Strike: Source makes sure that more experienced players are rewarded for their effort and mastership.

It was a perfect game and, I can't lie that I had amazing times, but an unexpected "fix" from Valve ruined most of the game's mecanics, like changing spray patterns, movement, etc. for no specific reason. The game died a bit from that point on and everyone turned to CS:GO.
One of my favorite shooters. Takes skill and practice, but it's VERY fun and addicting.
Essential game on steam. Everybody needs to buy this.

great game, very fast paced. Only bad thing is that you have to learn fast, everyone that plays is crazy good.
Jogo bastante divertido, e para quem gosta de competição, é do melhor.

Counter-Strike: Source is a simple, yet exciting refresh of Valve's blockbuster game of 2000, Counter-Strike. The mechanics remain fairly unchanged, yet it is still fun to play - especially with friends. I remember playing Counter-Strike in school (Hehehe) with numerous people, all somewhere around the school, via LAN. Occasionally, you could hear someone exclaim "Dang it!" or something like that, indicating who they were. Our teacher (thankfully) never noticed, but even if he did, he probably didn't care.

Are you going the rescue the hostages or defuse the bomb, or will you die trying to cause havoc? Counter-Strike: Source provides hours of fun and strategic gameplay.
Pissesjovt.... stadig godt efter mange år på bagen, en del hackere, men alt i alt 8/10! :)
Can't beat it man. After all these years i still can't get enough of the game. Great community and extremely fun custom game types. It is a must have.
